guitrisentis
Class TrisentisBoard

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gui.GameBoard
                      guitrisentis.TrisentisBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class TrisentisBoard
extends GameBoard

This class represents the graphical representation of a game board for the Trisentis game or the game on a grid. Here the clicks on fields are realized by clicks on panels. A MouseListener on each field waits for clicks.

Author:
Irene Thesing
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

SHOW_APPLIANCE_MODE

public static final int SHOW_APPLIANCE_MODE
In this mode the given configuration on the game board is shown as well as it appliance to a Trisentis game board with an additional border.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

TrisentisBoard

public TrisentisBoard(Trisentis trisentis,
                      int startMode)
Creates a new Trisentis game board.

Parameters:
trisentis - the Trisentis game which is displayed.
startMode - the mode which the gameBoard shall have, GAME_MODE for playing or GAME_RECORD_MODE for playing with record for example.

TrisentisBoard

public TrisentisBoard(BooleanMatrix toShow)
Creates a new Trisentis game board which shows the given matrix.

Parameters:
toShow - the matrix which shall be shown on the Trisentis game board.

initRecordPanel

protected void initRecordPanel()
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Initializes the view of the record board. It is needed if GAME_RECORD_MODE is active.

Specified by:
initRecordPanel in class GameBoard

updateSituation

public void updateSituation()
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Updates a situation with the game configuration which is given by the actual state of the trisentis game. Updates also the record Panel if the mode is GAME_RECORD_MODE. The method is useful for GAME_MODE, GAME_RECORD_MODE or INPUT_MODE.

Specified by:
updateSituation in class GameBoard

initSpecialMode

protected void initSpecialMode(int mode)
Description copied from class: GameBoard
If the subclass has some more possible mode values, they shall be dealed with in this method. Otherwise leave the method empty or throw some exception.

Specified by:
initSpecialMode in class GameBoard
Parameters:
mode - Some new mode values.

updateSituation

public void updateSituation(boolean[] showSit)
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Updates a situation with the given configuration given as a list of boolean values, numbered in an array. This method is useful to show some solutions in SHOW_MODE.

Specified by:
updateSituation in class GameBoard
Parameters:
showSit - situation which shall be shown on the board.

startConGame

protected Trisentis startConGame(boolean recordActive)
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Starts the game with or without record - here all the things are dealt which depends on the concrete game, so dealt with in the subclasses.

Specified by:
startConGame in class GameBoard
Parameters:
recordActive - whether the game shall be recorded.

startConInput

protected void startConInput()
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Here all the things are dealt which depends on the concrete game to start the input mode, so dealt with in the subclasses.

Specified by:
startConInput in class GameBoard

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Starts a new TrisentisBoard for testing it in a game mode with record display.
